text:
Creighton University | HortonWorks Engineer/Admin and Senior Full Stack JS Engineers | Omaha, NE | Onsite or Remote (US-only), Contract

Creighton University is a Jesuit, Catholic university bridging health, law, business and the arts and sciences for a more just world. Join us in building a new higher education digital experience.

You are good match for this position if you are a motivated and energetic full-stack developer or hortonworks engineer, you take initiative, find solutions to problems, you are thorough and know how to produce results quickly under minimal supervision.

  Our stack is a combination of:
  * Frontend: Javascript, React, Webpack, Bootstrap
  * Middleware: NodeJS, Express, Passport, Nginx, 
  * Backend: Cassandra, MySQL, Ambari, Ranger, Kafka, ZooKeeper, Spark, Hive, HDFS
Please send your resume to williammahler [at] creighton.edu for consideration.
